ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Ester Update
ygData.msgSnippet: ummm....the dissappearing text thing is NOT a bard only thing. I have seen it with my ranger, monk and cleric. Oh yeah...with my bard too..:) It seems to be
ygData.messageBody:
ummm....the dissappearing text thing is NOT
a bard only thing.

I have seen it with my ranger, monk and cleric.

Oh yeah...with my bard too..:)

It seems to be across the board to me.



> On another note to a VERY long post, the but with the disapeparing text
> buffer (which is one I want fixed!!) are you guys getting it a lot? I am
> going to post it's own thread, but we are seeing it mostly with bards...
> /sigh
>
> Please know that I am not ignorning or blowing anyone's issues off. These
> things take more time than I realized.
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
